channel.title: 667 Making npcs automatically respawn
channel.description:
How can I make npcs respawn because through npcspawning it wont work and through unpackedspawn neither.
Using zenithscape base.
Any ideas?

item.title: 667 Making npcs automatically respawn
item.dc:creator: @jefersonpang jefersonpang
item.description:
@jefersonpang wrote:

data>npc>unpacedcombatdef
open and it goes a lil something like this:

NPC ID - Hp - Att - Def - Death - atkdelay - deathdelay - respawn - maxhit - attackStyle attackGfx - attackProjectile - agressivenessType
so say i wanted to change the respawn of this:
709 - 100 2 2 2 4 4 60 20 MELEE 65535 1898 AGRESSIVE
i would change 60 to whatever then just delete packedbonuses and badabing badaboom

Read full topic
